00045         public static string DumpProperties(object Object)
00046         {
00047             try
00048             {
00049                 StringBuilder TempValue = new StringBuilder();
00050                 TempValue.Append("<table><thead><tr><th>Property Name</th><th>Property Value</th></tr></thead><tbody>");
00051                 Type ObjectType = Object.GetType();
00052                 PropertyInfo[] Properties = ObjectType.GetProperties();
00053                 foreach (PropertyInfo Property in Properties)
00054                 {
00055                     TempValue.Append("<tr><td>" + Property.Name + "</td><td>");
00056                     ParameterInfo []Parameters = Property.GetIndexParameters();
00057                     if (Property.CanRead && Parameters.Length == 0)
00058                     {
00059                         try
00060                         {
00061                             object Value = Property.GetValue(Object, null);
00062                             TempValue.Append(Value == null ? "null" : Value.ToString());
00063                         }
00064                         catch { }
00065                     }
00066                     TempValue.Append("</td></tr>");
00067                 }
00068                 TempValue.Append("</tbody></table>");
00069                 return TempValue.ToString();
00070             }
00071             catch (Exception e)
00072             {
00073                 return e.ToString();
00074             }
00075         }
00076 
00083         public static string DumpProperties(Type ObjectType)
00084         {
00085             try
00086             {
00087                 StringBuilder TempValue = new StringBuilder();
00088                 TempValue.Append("<table><thead><tr><th>Property Name</th><th>Property Value</th></tr></thead><tbody>");
00089                 PropertyInfo[] Properties = ObjectType.GetProperties();
00090                 foreach (PropertyInfo Property in Properties)
00091                 {
00092                     TempValue.Append("<tr><td>" + Property.Name + "</td><td>");
00093                     if (Property.GetIndexParameters().Length == 0)
00094                     {
00095                         try
00096                         {
00097                             TempValue.Append(Property.GetValue(null, null) == null ? "null" : Property.GetValue(null, null).ToString());
00098                         }
00099                         catch { }
00100                     }
00101                     TempValue.Append("</td></tr>");
00102                 }
00103                 TempValue.Append("</tbody></table>");
00104                 return TempValue.ToString();
00105             }
00106             catch (Exception e)
00107             {
00108                 return e.ToString();
00109             }
00110         }

00116         public static string DumpAllAssembliesAndProperties()
00117         {
00118             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00119             Assembly[] Assemblies = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies();
00120             foreach (Assembly Assembly in Assemblies)
00121             {
00122                 Builder.Append("<strong>" + Assembly.GetName().Name + "</strong><br />");
00123                 Builder.Append(DumpProperties(Assembly)+"<br /><br />");
00124             }
00125             return Builder.ToString();
00126         }

00133         public static System.Reflection.Assembly GetLoadedAssembly(string Name)
00134         {
00135             foreach(Assembly TempAssembly in AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies())
00136             {
00137                 if(TempAssembly.GetName().Name.Equals(Name,StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))
00138                 {
00139                     return TempAssembly;
00140                 }
00141             }
00142             return null;
00143         }

00151         public static object MakeShallowCopy(object Object,bool SimpleTypesOnly)
00152         {
00153             Type ObjectType = Object.GetType();
00154             PropertyInfo[] Properties = ObjectType.GetProperties();
00155             FieldInfo[] Fields = ObjectType.GetFields();
00156             object ClassInstance = Activator.CreateInstance(ObjectType);
00157 
00158             foreach (PropertyInfo Property in Properties)
00159             {
00160                 try
00161                 {
00162                     if (SimpleTypesOnly)
00163                     {
00164                         SetPropertyifSimpleType(Property, ClassInstance, Object);
00165                     }
00166                     else
00167                     {
00168                         SetProperty(Property, ClassInstance, Object);
00169                     }
00170                 }
00171                 catch { }
00172             }
00173 
00174             foreach (FieldInfo Field in Fields)
00175             {
00176                 try
00177                 {
00178                     if (SimpleTypesOnly)
00179                     {
00180                         SetFieldifSimpleType(Field, ClassInstance, Object);
00181                     }
00182                     else
00183                     {
00184                         SetField(Field, ClassInstance, Object);
00185                     }
00186                 }
00187                 catch { }
00188             }
00189 
00190             return ClassInstance;
00191         }
00192 
00200         public static object MakeShallowCopyInheritedClass(Type DerivedType,object Object, bool SimpleTypesOnly)
00201         {
00202             Type ObjectType = Object.GetType();
00203             Type ReturnedObjectType = DerivedType;
00204             PropertyInfo[] Properties = ObjectType.GetProperties();
00205             FieldInfo[] Fields = ObjectType.GetFields();
00206             object ClassInstance = Activator.CreateInstance(ReturnedObjectType);
00207 
00208             foreach (PropertyInfo Property in Properties)
00209             {
00210                 try
00211                 {
00212                     PropertyInfo ChildProperty = ReturnedObjectType.GetProperty(Property.Name);
00213                     if (ChildProperty != null)
00214                     {
00215                         if (SimpleTypesOnly)
00216                         {
00217                             SetPropertyifSimpleType(ChildProperty, Property, ClassInstance, Object);
00218                         }
00219                         else
00220                         {
00221                             SetProperty(ChildProperty, Property, ClassInstance, Object);
00222                         }
00223                     }
00224                 }
00225                 catch { }
00226             }
00227 
00228             foreach (FieldInfo Field in Fields)
00229             {
00230                 try
00231                 {
00232                     FieldInfo ChildField = ReturnedObjectType.GetField(Field.Name);
00233                     if (ChildField != null)
00234                     {
00235                         if (SimpleTypesOnly)
00236                         {
00237                             SetFieldifSimpleType(ChildField, Field, ClassInstance, Object);
00238                         }
00239                         else
00240                         {
00241                             SetField(ChildField, Field, ClassInstance, Object);
00242                         }
00243                     }
00244                 }
00245                 catch { }
00246             }
00247 
00248             return ClassInstance;
00249         }

00257         public static System.Collections.Generic.List<Type> GetTypes(Assembly Assembly, string Interface)
00258         {
00259             System.Collections.Generic.List<Type> ReturnList = new System.Collections.Generic.List<Type>();
00260             if (Assembly != null)
00261             {
00262                 Type[] Types = Assembly.GetTypes();
00263                 foreach (Type Type in Types)
00264                 {
00265                     if (Type.GetInterface(Interface, true) != null)
00266                     {
00267                         ReturnList.Add(Type);
00268                     }
00269                 }
00270             }
00271             return ReturnList;
00272         }
00273 
00281         public static System.Collections.Generic.List<Type> GetTypes(string AssemblyLocation, string Interface,out Assembly Assembly)
00282         {
00283             Assembly = Assembly.LoadFile(AssemblyLocation);
00284             return GetTypes(Assembly, Interface);
00285         }

00293         public static ListMapping<Assembly, Type> GetTypesFromDirectory(string AssemblyDirectory, string Interface)
00294         {
00295             ListMapping<Assembly, Type> ReturnList = new ListMapping<Assembly,Type>();
00296             System.Collections.Generic.List<Assembly> Assemblies = GetAssembliesFromDirectory(AssemblyDirectory);
00297             foreach (Assembly Assembly in Assemblies)
00298             {
00299                 Type[] Types = Assembly.GetTypes();
00300                 foreach (Type Type in Types)
00301                 {
00302                     if (Type.GetInterface(Interface, true) != null)
00303                     {
00304                         ReturnList.Add(Assembly, Type);
00305                     }
00306                 }
00307             }
00308             return ReturnList;
00309         }
00310 
00316         public static System.Collections.Generic.List<Assembly> GetAssembliesFromDirectory(string Directory)
00317         {
00318             System.Collections.Generic.List<Assembly> ReturnList = new System.Collections.Generic.List<Assembly>();
00319             System.Collections.Generic.List<FileInfo> Files = FileManager.FileList(Directory);
00320             foreach (FileInfo File in Files)
00321             {
00322                 if (File.Extension.Equals(".dll", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00323                 {
00324                     ReturnList.Add(Assembly.LoadFile(File.FullName));
00325                 }
00326             }
00327             return ReturnList;
00328         }

00340         private static void SetField(FieldInfo Field, object ClassInstance, object Object)
00341         {
00342             try
00343             {
00344                 if (Field.IsPublic)
00345                 {
00346                     Field.SetValue(ClassInstance, Field.GetValue(Object));
00347                 }
00348             }
00349             catch { }
00350         }
00351 
00358         private static void SetFieldifSimpleType(FieldInfo Field, object ClassInstance, object Object)
00359         {
00360             Type FieldType = Field.FieldType;
00361             if(Field.FieldType.FullName.StartsWith("System.Collections.Generic.List", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00362             {
00363                 FieldType=Field.FieldType.GetGenericArguments()[0];
00364             }
00365 
00366             if (FieldType.FullName.StartsWith("System"))
00367             {
00368                 SetField(Field, ClassInstance, Object);
00369             }
00370         }
00371 
00379         private static void SetField(FieldInfo ChildField, FieldInfo Field, object ClassInstance, object Object)
00380         {
00381             try
00382             {
00383                 if (Field.IsPublic && ChildField.IsPublic)
00384                 {
00385                     ChildField.SetValue(ClassInstance, Field.GetValue(Object));
00386                 }
00387             }
00388             catch { }
00389         }
00390 
00398         private static void SetFieldifSimpleType(FieldInfo ChildField, FieldInfo Field, object ClassInstance, object Object)
00399         {
00400             Type FieldType = Field.FieldType;
00401             if (Field.FieldType.FullName.StartsWith("System.Collections.Generic.List", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00402             {
00403                 FieldType = Field.FieldType.GetGenericArguments()[0];
00404             }
00405 
00406             if (FieldType.FullName.StartsWith("System"))
00407             {
00408                 SetField(ChildField, Field, ClassInstance, Object);
00409             }
00410         }

00418         private static void SetPropertyifSimpleType(PropertyInfo Property, object ClassInstance, object Object)
00419         {
00420             Type PropertyType = Property.PropertyType;
00421             if (Property.PropertyType.FullName.StartsWith("System.Collections.Generic.List", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00422             {
00423                 PropertyType = Property.PropertyType.GetGenericArguments()[0];
00424             }
00425 
00426             if (PropertyType.FullName.StartsWith("System"))
00427             {
00428                 SetProperty(Property, ClassInstance, Object);
00429             }
00430         }
00431 
00438         private static void SetProperty(PropertyInfo Property, object ClassInstance, object Object)
00439         {
00440             try
00441             {
00442                 if (Property.GetSetMethod() != null && Property.GetGetMethod() != null)
00443                 {
00444                     Property.SetValue(ClassInstance, Property.GetValue(Object, null), null);
00445                 }
00446             }
00447             catch { }
00448         }
00449 
00457         private static void SetProperty(PropertyInfo ChildProperty, PropertyInfo Property, object ClassInstance, object Object)
00458         {
00459             try
00460             {
00461                 if (ChildProperty.GetSetMethod() != null && Property.GetGetMethod() != null)
00462                 {
00463                     ChildProperty.SetValue(ClassInstance, Property.GetValue(Object, null), null);
00464                 }
00465             }
00466             catch { }
00467         }
00468 
00476         private static void SetPropertyifSimpleType(PropertyInfo ChildProperty, PropertyInfo Property, object ClassInstance, object Object)
00477         {
00478             Type PropertyType = Property.PropertyType;
00479             if (Property.PropertyType.FullName.StartsWith("System.Collections.Generic.List", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00480             {
00481                 PropertyType = Property.PropertyType.GetGenericArguments()[0];
00482             }
00483
